definition: old place name (in Yan of Warring states, in modern Beijing city)

sentences.english: The Former Site of The Central Committee of The Chinese Communist Youth League is No. 6 Yuyang Road.
sentences.chinese: 上海團中央舊址位於盧灣區淮海中路漁陽裏6號。

sentences.english: The advanced modern facility of Yu Yang Recreation City provides you greatest enjoy for leisure and amusement.
sentences.chinese: 漁陽康樂城現代化的設施，是休閒娛樂的最佳選擇。

definition: border fort, esp. defending narrow valley
Hannan district of Wuhan city 武漢市|武汉市[Wu3 han4 shi4], Hubei
Pengze county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
Yang Jiong (650-693?), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
fire beacon (used as alarm signal over long distance)
Longsha district of Qiqihar city 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
Jiange county in Guangyuan 廣元|广元[Guang3 yuan2], Sichuan
postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers
Lintao county in Dingxi 定西[Ding4 xi1], Gansu
fabled island in Eastern sea, abode of immortals/same as Penglai 蓬萊|蓬莱
